message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its incredible value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000.  I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is truly unique and warrants a premium price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,250,000.
